## Installation

```r
remotes::install_github("francisbarton/mapirosa")
```

## Examples

```r
oxford <- create_bbox("Oxford", 27700)
build_basemap(oxford, zoom = 5, type = "leisure", crs = 27700)
basemap

tmap::tm_shape(basemap, raster.downsample = FALSE) +
  tmap::tm_rgb(max.value = 1)
```
